    • メソッドの詳細

      • getBlockState

        public BlockState getBlockState()
        Gets the block state as currently held, or (if it has not gotten it from the world) loads it from the world. This will only look up the state from the world if forceLoad is true or the block position is loaded.

      • getTileEntity

        @Nullable
public TileEntity getTileEntity()
        Gets the tile entity as currently held, or (if it has not gotten it from the world) loads it from the world.

      • getWorld

        public IWorldReader getWorld()

      • getPos

        public BlockPos getPos()

      • hasState

        public static java.util.function.Predicate<CachedBlockInfo> hasState(java.util.function.Predicate<BlockState> predicatesIn)
        Creates a new Predicate that will match when the given IBlockState predicate matches.
